thread.title: Aegion Corporation to Announce Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results - Yahoo Finance
thread.title_full: Aegion Corporation to Announce Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results - Yahoo Finance

author: Aegion Corporation
title: Aegion Corporation to Announce Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results - Yahoo Finance
text:
ST. LOUIS--(BUSINESS WIRE)--
Aegion Corporation (Nasdaq Global Select Market: AEGN) will issue its financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2015 on Monday, November 2, 2015 before the market opens. 
Charles R. Gordon, President and Chief Executive Officer, will host a conference call on Tuesday, November 3, 2015 at 9:30 a.m. Eastern Standard Time to discuss Aegion's business performance. There will be a question and answer period after the prepared remarks. 
Any financial or statistical information presented during the call, including any non-GAAP measures, the most directly comparable GAAP measures and reconciliation to GAAP results, can be found in the section titled Webcasts located at: http://www.aegion.com/Investors/Webcasts . 
EARNINGS RELEASE: 
Monday, November 2, 2015 - Before the market opens 
LIVE CONFERENCE CALL AND WEBCAST: 
Tuesday, November 3, 2015, 9:30 a.m. Eastern Standard Time
Listen-only , Toll free: 877-312-8824
Listen-only , Toll: 408-940-3830
Confirmation Code: 57412158 
The conference call will be webcast live via the Internet on Aegion's website ( www.aegion.com/Investors/Webcasts ). To access the webcast, connect to the website five to ten minutes prior to the scheduled time. 
CONFERENCE CALL REPLAY: 
An audio archive and podcast of the webcast, available approximately two hours after the conclusion of the conference call, can be found at: www.aegion.com/Investors/Webcasts . 
Aegion Corporation is a global leader in infrastructure protection and maintenance, providing proprietary technologies and services: (i) to protect against the corrosion of industrial pipelines; (ii) to rehabilitate and strengthen water, wastewater, energy and mining piping systems and buildings, bridges, tunnels and waterfront structures; and (iii) to utilize integrated professional services in engineering, procurement, construction, maintenance and turnaround services for a broad range of energy related industries. Our business activities include manufacturing, distribution, maintenance, construction, installation, coating and insulation, cathodic protection, research and development and licensing. 
More information about Aegion can be found on its internet site at www.aegion.com . 

View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20151009005889/en/ 
Company Earnings Contact: Aegion Corporation
Ruben Mella, 636-530-8000
Vice President Investor Relations, Marketing and Communications
